GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
net: rtnetlink: fix module reference count leak issue in rtnetlink_rcv_msg

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit ce12ce2e88646e221601f29a7dd8d7613f5cbf01, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit a6cec0bcd34264be8887791594be793b3f12719f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: rtnetlink: fix module reference count leak issue in rtnetlink_rcv_msg
